name: John's Crabby Caps
author: WIGWAM7
summary: Crab stuffed mushrooms with a little extra attitude!
ingredients: ¼ cup Italian-style seasoned bread crumbs
2 (6 ounce) cans crabmeat, drained and flaked
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, cook and stir the garlic in the butter until tender
In a medium bowl, mix garlic and butter, chili powder, 3/4 cup Parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, Italian-style breadcrumbs, salt and pepper
Increase the amount of mayonnaise, if desired
Stuff mushroom caps generously with the mixture from the bowl
Pour cooking sherry in a large baking dish
Arrange stuffed mushroom caps, stuffing side up, in the baking dish
Bake 10 minutes in the preheated oven
Continue cooking mushrooms 3 to 5 minutes, or until stuffing is bubbly and lightly browned
Allow to cool slightly before serving
